title: AI Founders Dinner — SF
description: Intimate gathering of 30 founders and investors. Speakers: Sarah Chen (Sequoia), James Liu (a16z). Topics: AI agents, fundraising.

title: AI Founders Dinner SF
description: Dinner for AI founders in San Francisco.

title: SF Startup Pitch Night
description: 10 early-stage startups pitch to a panel of VCs. Networking reception to follow. Free admission.

title: Machine Learning Paper Reading Group
description: Weekly paper reading session covering the latest ML research. This week: diffusion models and their applications.

title: Developer Tools Happy Hour
description: Casual drinks for developers building developer tools. Hosted at Zeitgeist bar in the Mission.

title: SaaS Metrics Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop covering unit economics, churn analysis, and growth metrics for SaaS founders. Led by a finance partner at Sequoia.

title: Bay Area AI Safety Meetup
description: Discussion on AI alignment and safety. Guest speaker from Anthropic.

title: Generative AI Demo Day
description: Watch 15 startups demo their generative AI products. Judges from Google, Microsoft, and OpenAI. Prize pool: $50K.

title: GenAI Demo Day — San Francisco
description: Generative AI demo day with 15 startups.

title: VC Office Hours for First-Time Founders
description: 30-minute 1-on-1 sessions with partners from a16z, Greylock, and Lightspeed. Application required.

title: Kubernetes & Cloud Native Meetup
description: Deep dive into Kubernetes operators and service mesh. Pizza and drinks provided.

title: Women in AI Networking Brunch
description: Brunch and networking for women in AI/ML. Panel discussion on career growth in tech. Location: The Vault SF.
